title: Old World Charm!  2-br mil Apartment Available Sept 1st.
posting_body: Cozy and charming 2-bedroom mil available now.
Conveniently located close to downtown Bellevue, Microsoft and to the University of Washington.
Like a little palace in a park-like setting!
Warm, welcoming, private, high-quality mother-in-law apartment available in large, beautiful, quiet and well-maintained Medina house.

The apartment has tall ceilings, new plush carpet, glass french doors, natural wood, elegant light fixtures and accessories; brand new gas range and other appliances; off-street parking; new washer, dryer and private patio in park-like setting.
New, tiled bathroom and kitchen; picture window surrounded by green trees, flowers and fruit trees.
Raspberries, wild strawberries and sweet native blackberries grow in the yard during the summer!
This is a dream come true, especially if you like gardening in your own private, pesticide-free flower garden and pea patch!
Large yard, perfect for growing your own organic vegetables and beautiful flowers.
Very quiet, safe and beautiful home and neighborhood with lots of trees, biking and amazing walking places.

Situated 2 minutes from highway 520; between I-405 and I-5; near many bus lines and perfect for public transportation: 6 minutes to downtown Bellevue, 12 minutes to Redmond Microsoft, 5 minutes to UW by bus; and 12 minutes to downtown Seattle by bus (shorter times by car).
No pets, please; minimum 6 month lease; and absolutely no smoking!
